column4: Hello. I have a problem. This is the second time this is happening. My icons in my desktop have disappeared, I am not able to open any folders. Why could this be happening?
!repeat - we heard you - we just a) dont know or b) havent gotten to you
Not sure how to answer that.. What do you mean special? I got an NTFS partition, and the linux file system whatever its called.. The default one.. I'm new to this
